data.title: Tap Tap Revenge Archives
data.text:
US retailer Best Buy is offering free music downloads via mobile game Tap Tap Revenge: Tour as part of its Back To Campus campaign.

Disney subsidiary Tapulous has unveiled its latest Tap Tap Revenge game for iPhone, and it could be one of its most popular yet. Tap Tap Glee focuses on the popular musical TV drama, with screen-tapping action and three free tracks: My Cup, Hell To The No, and Don’t Stop Believin’.

You can’t escape Lady Gaga this week, as the promotional juggernaut around her Born This Way album continues to roll. Mobile developer Tapulous has created a new …

Nickelback have got their own Tap Tap Revenge game for iPhone, becoming the latest artist to get the Tapulous treatment. Nickelback Revenge costs $4.99 and includes 11 hits, including Rockstar and How You Remind Me.

Nirvana was the centre of an almighty hoo-ha last year when a Kurt Cobain avatar in Guitar Hero could be used to play Bon Jovi songs. The band’s latest game deal should be less controversial: iPhone developer Tapulous is preparing to release Nirvana Revenge as the latest spin-off from its Tap Tap Revenge games…

Kings Of Leon are the latest band to team up with Tapulous for a branded iPhone music game. Kings Of Leon Revenge just launched, and features ten of the band’s tracks, as well as a news feed, tourdates info and chat rooms. The game also has a local Bluetooth multiplayer mode, and what Tapulous describes as some of its best visuals yet.

On the face of it, Tap Studio Pro is a pretty blatant rip-off of iPhone game Tap Tap Revenge. Coloured dots fall down the screen to be tapped in time to music, with bonuses for hitting lots of them in a row.

With 25 million downloads (and counting), Tapulous’ series of Tap Tap Revenge iPhone games has taken the App Store by storm. Now the company has released a new game, Riddim Ribbon, developed with the Black Eyed Peas.

Tapulous made its iPhone music game Tap Tap Revenge free just before Christmas, with the aim of making money from ads and in-app song purchases. In the first 24 hours after going free, the game was downloaded 300,000 times. A week later, and it had racked up two million new downloads.

Grr! iPhone developer Tapulous has launched the latest artist spin-off from its Tap Tap Revenge games: Metallica Revenge.The game features branded visuals and tracks including Enter Sandman, One, Master of […]

iPhone music game Tap Tap Revenge has reached its third incarnation, with the latest version including downloadable content.

iPhone developer Tapulous has seen its Tap Tap Revenge games downloaded more than 15 million times, and while it has a healthy business in premium spin-offs, the majority of those downloads are still free.
